comments: Professor was very nice, but I did not learn much fom him. The classes consisted of movies, two hour discussions on one topic with him giving multiple examples. The papers were a bit confusing because he was never quite clear on what he expected. No tests, just three papers and 1 group project. Laid back class other than the three papers.

Dr. Fred was great. Fun, low-stress class. The research paper will take A LOT of your time outside class. Start as early as possible. He\'s not a hard grader as long as you can write a good APA research paper (20+ pages). No other projects/assignments toward your final grade.
Pretty laid back. Not much homework. Had to write 2 big papers about 20 pages in length.

His class is not hard, but midterm and final are very time consuming. You will read a lot of material for your research paper. Try to work on it as early as possible. He is very fair with the grades. Take his class.

Teacher has a lot of experience and is very interested in his subject. There are about 4 papers ranging from 3 pages to 8 pages. Final presentation and powerpoint. Several personality-type assessments that are analyzed in class. Overall, very nice teacher and the class was a lot of fun!
Class is kinda boring but very short. Usually out within 1.5 hours. Dr. Fred is a nice guy, funny sense of humor but I really didnt learn anything new in this class.
